ConnectforHealth 

Your invite to Cigna Healthcare's wellbeing webinar series 

At Cigna Healthcare, we recognize the importance of prioritizing your health and wellbeing. As your health and wellness partner, we are fully committed to helping you establish healthy habits. 

You are invited to join Cigna Healthcare’s Connect for Health webinar on: 

Feel better, live better: nurturing your emotional health 

Dive into the science of happiness and explore how mindful practices, gratitude and emotional intelligence can help strengthen your resilience, no matter life’s challenges. 

 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	 	 Save the date

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bef802401-370c-4712-9218-60c559e443ae%7D_calendar.png> 	 	 Date: Wednesday, March 12th 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B140e7be3-ca9e-4dbd-8207-7fd388d309c7%7D_time.png> 	 	 Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM (Gulf Standard Time) 

Click here to register <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/QERUClMq4TzQOoYSyi5Uzw2-K?domain=event.on24.com> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B527446aa-7dc8-4d54-b932-6648c59be348%7D_HajraHussain._CPsychol__AFBPsS_.JPG> 	Hajra Hussain 
AFBPsS, CPsychol, MSc, BSc (Hons) 

Hajra Hussain is a British Chartered Psychologist (CPsychol), Associate Fellow (AFBPsS) of the British Psychological Society, and a qualified therapist specialising in Advanced Rational Emotive Behavioural Therapy (REBT), Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), Positive Psychology, and Wellbeing Coaching. 

With 18 years of experience, including 13 years in the UAE, she provides 1:1 coaching and strategic wellbeing solutions that build resilience and drive sustainable growth.

chunks.text:
Hajra Hussain is a British Chartered Psychologist (CPsychol), Associate Fellow (AFBPsS) of the British Psychological Society, and a qualified therapist specialising in Advanced Rational Emotive Behavioural Therapy (REBT), Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), Positive Psychology, and Wellbeing Coaching. 

With 18 years of experience, including 13 years in the UAE, she provides 1:1 coaching and strategic wellbeing solutions that build resilience and drive sustainable growth.

She has designed and facilitated wellbeing programmes across government (UK and UAE), corporate, medical (NHS), education, telecom, finance, retail, and high-growth industries. Working with leaders and employees, she cultivates emotionally intelligent leadership, supports work-life balance, and helps address challenges such as stress and burnout. 

Hajra is deeply committed to helping individuals and organisations thrive through evidence-based psychological practices, fostering positive and lasting change. 

 	 
If you face any problems with registration, please write to us on meacommunications@cigna.com <mailto:meacommunications@cigna.com>
